      • read

        public byte[] read()
        Description :
        Reads the bytes bytewhise to the file We use the fastest way to read the file.
        File Reading: http://nadeausoftware.com/articles/2008/02/java_tip_how_read_files_quickly
        Returns:
        the content redden from the file or new byte[0] on any error
